attributes.action: Allow 16 + to vote if another EU referendum occures
attributes.additional_details: The hightest stay vote age catogory was the youngest which the descision depends on their future economy education and lives. 16 and 17 year olds should be able to vote as the decision effects univercity choices which are descisions these young people have to make. It will also effect the economy in which they have to work and create a life for themselves where as older generations already have a job and a house ect. So their futures are not as badly effected
attributes.background: If the older generation can vote with little left of their lives that can be affected why cant 16 and above vote as they have to know what job the're going to do when they leave high school so surely they should have enough political understanding of descisions that effects there further and lives
